summary: Bilingual Industrial Engineer with strong mathematical, analytical, problem solving and interpersonal skills; strong attention to detail, self-starter, fast learner, proactive, and equally able to work in teams or independently with little to none supervision according to the situation. Currently working as a Product Manager and Reporting Analyst for the Reporting team in StrongMind, an E-Learning company in Chandler, AZ. Our team primary focus is providing the company, and external stakeholders (online schools) with the data they need to make business operations decisions, as well as monitor student achievement, progress, and performance.
